mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_role (name, depart_id, note,update_time,update_user) VALUES (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{departId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},now(),#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT sr.id, sr.name, sd.id as departId,sd.name as departName,sr.note, sr.update_time,sr.update_user FROM sys_role sr left join sys_depart sd on sr.depart_id = sd.id WHERE sr.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT distinct sr.id, sr.name, sr.depart_id as departId,sr.note, sr.update_time,sr.update_user FROM sys_role sr , sys_user_role sur WHERE sr.id = sur.role_id AND sr.depart_id = #{departId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
